Name: 末日竟在我身边 - Zombies Everywhere
About the game: 'Zombies Everywhere' is a game of escape from the chamber of secrets in the background of the end of the world. Introduction The story takes place on the 101st day after the zombie virus broke out and you were trapped in a room of a building. Feature Six professions, servant, boxer, nurse, police, athlete and fireman, have been opened to trigger different scenarios and choices. Each profession can choose gender, male or female. New player comes on stage with different props. There are specific keys of every safe and every room. They may be hidden in garbage cans, toilet cisterns, flower pots, or even zombies. Simplified battle judgment based on the rules of Dungeons & Dragons, one second decides the outcome. Achievement Sell 3,000 copies or get 50 positive reviews. Develop a sequel story. Player communication and bug feedback Official QQ communication group: 582118652 Video Guide
